Somerville.Albert Vinal House:
The Albert Vinal House is an historic house located at 325 Harvard Street in Cambridge, Massachusetts.


== Description and history ==
The substantial Greek Revival house was built in 1853-1854 by Albert Vinal, a real estate developer and a dealer in lumber, wood, and coal. In addition to a fully pedimented gable, the house has wide corner pilasters, and several porches and porticos.
